vote.title: Appointment of Corrine Burger, Managing Director, JPMorgan Chase, 1111 Polaris Parkway, Columbus, Ohio 43240, to serve as the joint City of Columbus-Franklin County appointee to the Columbus Regional Airport Authority Board of Directors, with a new term expiration date of December 31, 2026 (profile attached).

Appointment of Corrine Burger, Managing Director, JPMorgan Chase, 1111 Polaris Parkway, Columbus, Ohio 43240, to serve as the joint City of Columbus-Franklin County appointee to the Columbus Regional Airport Authority Board of Directors, with a new term expiration date of December 31, 2026 (profile attached).
